name: Kaguya-sama and Fujiwara Grill Yakitori
description:
Everyone in Gensoukyou knows that Fujiwara and Kaguya regularly engage in deathmatch duels. But what really happens during these events?

This is a one-stage Terumoko script made for the 2020 June Touhou Pride Jam. Mokou just wants to grill!

You have infinite lives in this script, so don't worry about dying. However, there are no bombs and the difficulty is quite high, so you may want to prefer a lower difficulty. (Or play Abex, it's your choice.)

See the README for controls.

Music by Miles Yalzin. Endcards and player sprite by Copper Chihuahaua. See COPYING or the source code for licenses.

Made with the Danmokou engine, which is free (as in free speech) software! https://github.com/Bagoum/danmokou
